tool.name: MISA to GFF3 Converter
tool.description: Identification and localization of perfect microsatellites as well as compound microsatellites

param.name: input
param.label: MISA Output File
param.help: This is the tab separated file that misa generates.

param.name: naming_prefix
param.label: Feature ID Naming Prefix
param.help: A prefix to add to the begining of each feature ID and Name attribute. Use only A-z 0-9 _ - characters. Leave empty if no prefix is required.

param.name: source_field
param.label: Source Field
param.help: Sets the source column in the GFF3 file. Defaults to MISA.

tool.help:
NAME ----
MISA to GFF3 Converter
AUTHOR ------
Iyad Kandalaft <iyad.kandalaft@agr.gc.ca> Agriculture and Agri-foods Canada Ottawa, ON, Canada
DESCRIPTION -----------
Converts MISA output into a GFF3 file containing Microsatellite features that include all the data from the MISA output as attributes. Allows users to set the ID and Name attribute prefix as well as the Source column in the GFF3 file.
CITATION ---------
Exploiting EST databases for the development and characterization of gene-derived SSR-markers in barley (Hordeum vulgare L.), T. Thiel, W. Michalek, R. Varshney and A. Graner, THEORETICAL AND APPLIED GENETICS Volume 106, Number 3, 411-422
INPUT AND OUTPUT OPTIONS ------------------------
Input - Accepts MISA's tabular output file
Output - Produces a GFF3 with Microsatellite features including all the data from the MISA output as attributes.
